title: Cookie Policy
subtitle: How we use cookies and similar technologies.

content.title: What Are Cookies
paragraphs: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and understand how our site is being used.
We use both session cookies (which expire when you close your browser) and persistent cookies (which stay on your device for a set period).

content.title: How We Use Cookies
paragraphs: We use cookies to remember your preferences, understand how you use our website, and improve your browsing experience.
Cookies help us analyze website traffic, personalize content, and provide social media features.

content.title: Types of Cookies We Use
paragraphs: Essential cookies: Necessary for the website to function properly.
Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
Preference cookies: Remember your choices and preferences.
Marketing cookies: Track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

content.title: Managing Cookies
paragraphs: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.
However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit a site and some services and functionalities may not work.
